  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2147</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grammar exercises:The use of adjectives.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebrauch der Grammatik exercises:The von 
Adjektiven.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation de la grammaire exercises:The des 
adjectifs.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uso da gramática exercises:The dos adjetivos.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uso di grammatica exercises:The degli aggettivi.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήση γραμματικής exercises:The των επιθέτων.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Uso de la gramática exercises:The de adjetivos.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These are grammar exercises for matriculation English students where they are to make correct use of adjectives (superlatives and comparisons)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">adjectives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">superlatives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comparisons</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese sind Grammatikübungen für matriculation englische 
Kursteilnehmer, in denen sie korrekten Gebrauch von Adjektiven bilden 
sollen (Superlatives und Vergleiche)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce sont des exercices de grammaire pour les étudiants 
anglais d'immatriculation où elles doivent faire l'utilisation correcte 
des adjectifs (des superlatifs et des comparaisons)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes são exercícios da gramática para os estudantes 
ingleses do matriculation onde devem fazer o uso correto dos adjetivos
(superlativos e comparações)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste sono esercitazioni di grammatica per gli allievi 
inglesi di matriculation in cui devono fare l'uso corretto degli 
aggettivi (superlatives e confronti)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές είναι ασκήσεις γραμματικής για τους αγγλικούς 
σπουδαστές εγγραφής όπου πρόκειται να κάνουν τη σωστή χρήση των
επιθέτων (superlatives και συγκρίσεις)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éstos son ejercicios de la gramática para los 
estudiantes ingleses del matriculation donde están hacer el uso 
correcto de adjetivos (los superlativos y las comparaciones)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Adjektive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Superlatives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
